product_name: Quiksilver Syncro 3/2 Back-Zip GBS Wetsuit - Men's
long_description: Perfect for paddling in chilly waters, the Quiksilver Syncro 3/2mm Back-Zip GBS wetsuit helps you get more out of your time on the water. Stretchy 3/2mm neoprene (3mm in body, 2mm in arms and legs) forms to your body for a flexible, comfortable fit; flatseam construction prevents chafing. Rear zipper secures fit and features an extra-long zipper pull; soft neoprene gusset prevents zipper abrasion. Two rip-and-stick tabs at neck seal securely. Brushed chest fabric on interior of suit boosts warmth and manages moisture. You'll enjoy full freedom of motion without chafing thanks to the glued and blind-stitched seams. Tough fabric over knees increases durability. Key loop near back zipper offers a convenient place to store a key. Hand wash the Quiksilver Syncro 3/2mm Back-Zip GBS wetsuit in cold water, drip dry out of sun and store in a cool, dry place.
short_description: Perfect for paddling in chilly waters, the Quiksilver Syncro 3/2mm Back-Zip GBS wetsuit helps you get more out of your time on the water.
